categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic organizations

nodes.text: Sector Command was a command unit of the Alliance High Command that was led by General Jan Dodonna. At one point during the Galactic Civil War, in response to the losses inflicted by an elite squadron composed of the Galactic Empire's TIE/ag "Aggressor" Starfighter within a a sector of the galaxy, Sector Command tasked a group of individuals to eliminate the squadron's pilots.
